title: Healed Through Humility   | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Healed Through Humility   | Joel Osteen
description:
If you want to have flourishing relationships, you have to learn to walk in humility. When you overlook offenses and let go of being right, you will see more of God's blessings in your life. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
